title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.13 - Record of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.13 - Record of proceedings

State Regulations
(a) A
verbatim recording shall be made of the proceedings. (b) A transcription of the record shall be
made available to any party upon request and payment of the cost of the
transcription. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
